title: How to Create a Database in phpMyAdmin

steps.title: Go to the phpMyAdmin homepage for your site.
steps.content: Go to the phpMyAdmin homepage for your site. It can usually be found under these directories, depending on your server setup. http://localhost:8888/phpMyAdmin/ http://localhost/phpmyadmin http://{your-ip-address}/phpmyadmin/

steps.title: Enter your login details to sign in.
steps.content: Enter your login details to sign in.

steps.title: Enter the new database name into the "Create a new database" field.
steps.content: Enter the new database name into the "Create a new database" field. For example, "my_new_database".

steps.title: This creates your new database.
steps.content: This creates your new database. You can now make changes to your database as needed.
